title: Software development topics I've changed my mind on
dot: digraph opinions{node[shape=box, style=filled, fontname="Helvetica"];rankdir=LR;changed[label="Changed My Mind On", fillcolor="#F7DC6F"];simplicity[label="Simple is not given", fillcolor="#FFFF99"];complexity[label="No pride in managing complexity", fillcolor="#FFFF99"];typed_languages[label="Typed languages are essential", fillcolor="#FFFF99"];java[label="Java is a great fillcolor="#FFFF99"];frontend[label="Frontend development is a nightmare", fillcolor="#FFFF99"];elegance[label="Elegance is not a real metric", fillcolor="#FFFF99"];management[label="Good management is invaluable", fillcolor="#FFFF99"];dynamodb[label="DynamoDB is a good database", fillcolor="#FFFF99"];objects[label="Objects are extremely good at what they're good at", fillcolor="#FFFF99"];picked_up[label="Opinions I've Picked Up", fillcolor="#C5E1F5"];engineering[label="Engineering is mostly about communication", fillcolor="#ADD8E6"];monad[label="Never go full fillcolor="#ADD8E6"];soft_skills[label="Invest in improving soft skills", fillcolor="#ADD8E6"];abstractions[label="Very few abstractions exist in general application development", fillcolor="#ADD8E6"];serverless[label="Building on Serverless Functions will be regretted", fillcolor="#ADD8E6"];types[label="Types are assertions we make about the world", fillcolor="#ADD8E6"];locking[label="Distributed locking is still hard", fillcolor="#ADD8E6"];formal_modeling[label="Formal modeling and analysis is essential", fillcolor="#ADD8E6"];isolation[label="Isolation is the most important property of a good integration suite", fillcolor="#ADD8E6"];dynamodb_bad[label="DynamoDB is the worst choice for general application development", fillcolor="#ADD8E6"];craft[label="Most won't care about the craft", fillcolor="#ADD8E6"];gradual[label="Gradual, dependently typed languages are the future", title: They Thought They Were Free: The Germans, 1933-45 (1955)
dot: digraph Thought_Process{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box, fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=12, style=filled, fillcolor=lightyellow];subgraph cluster_start{label="The Gap Between Government and People";style=dashed;gap_start[label="1933: Beginning of gap between government and people", shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightblue];habit_start[label="Gradual habituation to government decisions", shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightblue];}subgraph cluster_process{label="Process of Government Growing Remote";style=dashed;habits[label="Habituation to governing by surprise", shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightgreen];distractions[label="Distractions: Meetings, work, crises", shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightgreen];isolation[label="Increasing sense of isolation", shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightgreen];avoidance[label="Avoidance of fundamental thinking", shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightgreen];}subgraph cluster_late{label="Realization and Consequences";style=dashed;late_realization[label="Realization too late: System of hate and fear", shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightcoral];shame[label="Shame and regret: Compromised beyond repair", shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightcoral];}gap_start->habits[label="Widening gap", color=blue];habits->distractions[label="People occupied with daily tasks", color=blue];distractions->isolation[label="Isolation increases", color=blue];isolation->avoidance[label="Avoidance of responsibility", color=blue];avoidance->late_realization[label="Late realization of changes", color=red];late_realization->shame[label="Regret, compromised", color=red];habit_start->habits[label="Small steps, imperceptible", color=blue];shame->shame[label="Cycle of regret", color=red];}
